TopicTitle: Display total science collected, stored & transmitted on a mission.

Articles.Content:
Just a simple display, maybe in the Resource tab, that shows the total science that has been collected, stored & transmitted on the current mission.

That is all.

I agree, a display of how much you've done during the mission, instead of only at the end, would be nice.

Perhaps even some sort of display of total science done, such as all the places you've taken surface samples from.
and would combine nicely with sending a single burst report for everything collected so far, rather than running out of electric charge after sending the report for a single experiment
